messages.title: The Choice.
messages.content: As we start to rebuild our economy...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting the economy, putting people back to work, and managing recovery after a worldwide recession.
Opposing cuts to schools, services for old folk, and loss of support for local charities.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour or Tories can win in Edinburgh South, implying strategic voting considerations against the LibDems.

issues.economy: The recession started in America and spread to every country in the world, including Scotland, putting jobs at risk here and everywhere.
issues.education: The LibDems running the Council made cuts to schools.
issues.socialWelfare: Services for old folk and to support our local charities were cut.

images.caption: Jobs all over South Edinburgh are at risk from Tory policies.
